welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Chippenham, known for its beautiful countryside and historic landmarks. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the rich culture and warm hospitality of this wonderful city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and government flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but a password is required for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upavon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bristol Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gloucestershire Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Brize Norton Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Brize Norton Airport handles all freight and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
